name: DefaultStringInterpolation
desc: Represents a string literal with interpolations while it is being built up.

items.name: typealias DefaultStringInterpolation.StringLiteralType
items.desc: The type that should be used for literal segments.

items.name: init(literalCapacity: Int, interpolationCount: Int)
items.desc: Creates a string interpolation with storage pre-sized for a literal with the indicated attributes.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: func appendInterpolation<T>(T)
items.desc: Interpolates the given value’s textual representation into the string literal being created.

items.name: func appendInterpolation<T>(T)
items.desc: Interpolates the given value’s textual representation into the string literal being created.

items.name: func appendInterpolation<T>(T)
items.desc: Interpolates the given value’s textual representation into the string literal being created.

items.name: func appendInterpolation<T>(T)
items.desc: Interpolates the given value’s textual representation into the string literal being created.

items.name: func appendLiteral(String)
items.desc: Appends a literal segment of a string interpolation.

items.name: func write(String)
items.desc: Appends the given string to the stream.
